parameterdescription.para: - READ Access control, valid value: READ_EN, READ_DIS
- Write access control, valid value: WRITE_EN, WRITE_DIS
- Instruction Execution control, valid value: EXECUTE_EN, EXECUTE_DIS

- Address matching mode, valid value: ADDR_MATCH_MODE_OFF - Null region ADDR_MATCH_TOR - Top of range. For pmp_addr0, any address < pmp_addr0 matches, for other regions, any address which meets ( pmp_addr[i-1] <= addr < pmp_addr) matches. ADDR_MATCH_NAPOT - Naturally aligned power-of-2 region, minimal size must be 8 bytes
- Write lock and permission enforcement bit for Machine mode, valid value: REG_LOCK, REG_UNLOCK
- Entry address matching mode, valid value: ADDR_MATCH_MODE_OFF - This PMA entry is disabled ADDR_MATCH_NAPOT - Naturally aligned power-of-2 regionï¼Œ the granularity is 4K bytes

- Memory type attributes, valid value: MEM_TYPE_DEV_NON_BUF - Device, Non-bufferable MEM_TYPE_DEV_BUF - Device, bufferable MEM_TYPE_MEM_NON_CACHE_NON_BUF - Memory, Non-cacheable, Non-bufferable MEM_TYPE_MEM_NON_CACHE_BUF - Memory, Non-cacheable, bufferable MEM_TYPE_MEM_WT_NO_ALLOC - Memory, Write-through, No-allocate MEM_TYPE_MEM_WT_READ_ALLOC - Memory, Write-through, read-allocate MEM_TYPE_MEM_WB_NO_ALLOC - Memory, Write-back, No-allocate MEM_TYPE_MEM_WB_READ_ALLOC - Memory, Write-back, Read-allocate MEM_TYPE_MEM_WB_READ_WRITE_ALLOC - Memory, Write-back, Write-Allocate, Read-Allocate MEM_TYPE_EMPTY_HOLE - Empty hole, nothing exists

- Indicate Whether Atomic Memory Operation instructions are not supported in this region, valid value: AMO_EN - Atomic Memory Operations are supported AMO_DIS - Atomic Memory Operations are not supported

briefdescription.para: Write PMP Configuration to corresponding PMP_CFG register.

parameterdescription.para: PMP entry index, valid value is 0-15

briefdescription.para: Write PMP address to corresponding PMP_ADDR register.

parameterdescription.para: PMP address entry index, valid value is 0-15

briefdescription.para: Write PMA Configuration to corresponding PMA_CFG register.

parameterdescription.para: PMA entry index, valid value is 0-15

briefdescription.para: Write PMA address to corresponding PMA_ADDR register.

parameterdescription.para: PMA address entry index, valid value is 0-15
PMA address entry index, valid value is 0-15

briefdescription.para: Configure PMP and PMA for specified PMP/PMA entry.
Configure PMP and PMA based on the PMP entry list.

parameterdescription.para: start of the PMP entry list
Number of entries in the PMP entry list
